description.full: This game was classified by the community with the following category scores - Violence=2/3, Sex=0/3, Mature Content=1/3. FarmFury! brings next-gen farming experience where you "Physically" destroy your opponents farm in order to become the best in the industry!  The game is a simplified RTS game where you produce mice and cow to attack and protect defend farms and use upgrades and special skills as a tactical options.
